title: CV Datasheets Compiled Data
description: Pre-compiled templates, community data, and metadata for Common Voice dataset datasheets. Consumed by the bundler via GitHub raw URL.

schema_version.description: Semantic version of this JSON schema. Breaking changes increment the major version.

generated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when this file was generated.

source_version.description: Dataset release version used as the source (e.g., '25.0-2026-03-09').

templates.description: Markdown templates keyed by modality and template language.

locales.description: Per-locale data keyed by modality and locale code.

template_set.description: Templates for a single modality. Keys are template language codes (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'zh-TW'). Values are full markdown template strings with {{PLACEHOLDER}} markers.

locale_set.description: Locale entries for a single modality. Keys are locale codes (e.g., 'en', 'de', 'es').

template_language.description: Which template language to use for this locale (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'zh-TW').

locale_metadata.description: Static metadata for this locale. The bundler may override stats (clips, hours, speakers) with its own pipeline data.

native_name.description: Language name in its native script. Falls back to locale code if unknown.

funding.description: Funding source identifier (e.g., 'omsf'). Empty string if not funded.

community_fields.description: Community-provided content for this locale. Keys match {{PLACEHOLDER}} names in templates (lowercased). Empty string means no community data -- bundler should use default or strip the section.
